dcterms:description: Market1501 contains 1,501 identities captured by six manually set cameras, with a total of 32,368 pedestrian images. Each person has an average of 3.6 images at each viewpoint, providing two types of images including cropped and automatically detected pedestrians.
dcterms:title: Market1501

dcterms:creator: W. Li
R. Zhao
T. Xiao
X. Wang
dcterms:description: CUHK03 contains 1,360 identities captured by six surveillance cameras in campus, resulting in a total of 13,164 person images. Each identity is captured by two disjoint cameras, with each identity having about 4.8 images at each viewpoint.
dcterms:title: CUHK03

dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
Z. Bie
Y. Sun
J. Wang
C. Su
S. Wang
Q. Tian
dcterms:description: MARS is the largest sequence-based person ReID dataset, containing 1,261 identities with each identity captured by at least two cameras. It consists of 20,478 tracklets and 1,191,003 bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: MARS
